works.description: My blog post "Remotely Shut Down Your PC from Mobile/PC Using Dropbox" is infringed by the text excerpted on the site, beginning with the text "If you forgot to shut down your PC when departing from your home or office and suddenly realized about that after traveling a long distance, you would return and then shut down your PC."

My blog post "Tips to Format Text When Writing Posts, Messages in Google Plus" is infringed by the text excerpted on the site, beginning with the text "It is time to celebrate the Google plus hike. From the past couple of days, I was involved in customizing my Google plus profile, enabling private message there and the thing in which I was involved more is sending invitation to people from my Google plus profile."

My blog post "Create Wireless Ad Hoc Network in Windows7 to Share Internet" is infringed by the text excerpted on the site, beginning with the text "Now a days in this growing world of technology, the internet has slowly but surely become a basic necessity in our day to day life."

My blog post "Install Font Containing New Indian Currency Symbol" is infringed by the text excerpted on the site, beginning with the text "In a previous article at Tech-Tips-Geek we discussed about how to create the new Indian Rupees font yourself and use them in any application in Windows."

My blog post "Change Windows User Passwords From Command Prompt" is infringed by the text excerpted on the site, beginning with the text "Every one like to protect their computer from any third person. "
